resources.string: A.1 Z Delivery is a food delivery service that does Home Deliveries to it\'s customers, from over 200 restaurants / outlets in Pune, Pimpri-Chinchwad and Navi-Mumbai. We are one of INDIA\'s premier Home Delivery Service.Operational since 1998, we have served over 75,000 people so far.
Q.2 How does this app charge you?
A.2 This app charges you only the BILL VALUE - as raised by the Restaurant - and in most cases, DOES NOT charge any delivery charges.
Q.3 Are the prices listed accurate and binding?

A.3 We make every effort to keep the prices updated and accurate. Prices listed on this website are however approximate and subject to changes by the Restaurant and Taxes. The final price is as per the ACTUAL BILL raised by the Restaurant and presented to you, at the time of the delivery.
Q.4 Can i get discounts on big orders?

A.4 Sorry, as a practice we do not give discounts as we work on very slim margins, already. But, we could check with the Restaurant - and IF they offer any special discount, we\'d be happy to pass it on to you!
What modes of payment are acceptable?

string.name: signup
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Sign up now
